verses.roman:
buddhimān-arthe--yadi 'vicāra-jña' haya
nija-kāma lāgiha tabe kṛṣṇere bhajaya

synonyms: buddhimān-arthe—by the meaning of intelligent; yadi—if; vicāra-jña—expert in scrutinizing things; haya—is; nija-kāma lāgiha—even for sense gratification; tabe—then; kṛṣṇere bhajana—worships Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "The meaning of the word udāra-dhīḥ is buddhimān-intelligent or considerate. Because of this, even for one's own sense gratification one engages in the devotional service of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
